Detailed Description

Button input.

This module prodived a boolean flag and an interrupt service routine. The flag is set to 1 by the ISR when the button is pressed. It is up to the application to reset the flag to 0.

The button_init function has to be called for the ISR to work.

Variable Documentation

volatile uint8_t button_pressed

Has the button been pressed?

This variable is set to 1 when the button is pressed. It is up to the application to reset it to 0.
